fields.name: Classico
fields.subtitle: The perfect cafetiere
fields.description: Classico coffee blend is full bodied with a balance flavour. A blend with an intense aroma and an important body, it has a slightly fruity and spicy taste. A persistent coffee with an elastic and compact cream.

fields.name: Armonisa
fields.subtitle: Light and floral
fields.description: A harmonious and balanced coffee in taste and aroma. A fine blend with a light roast that envelops the hints of chocolate and caramel to its full body.

fields.name: Vellutato
fields.subtitle: Organic coffee
fields.description: 100% Rainforest certified Arabica blend: precious and sustainable. A light roasted coffee that is soft on the palate and with an aromatic profile characterized by floral and dried fruit scents and a high acidity.

fields.name: Intenso
fields.subtitle: Bold espresso
fields.description: The dark roasting of this blend gives a full-bodied coffee with a rich, lingering crema and delicious overtones of cocoa, spices and nuts.

fields.name: Cremoso
fields.subtitle: Smooth and balanced
fields.description: A light-roasted blend for a creamy, full-bodied coffee showing hints of malt, nuts and chocolate.

fields.name: Professional
fields.subtitle: Taste of world coffee
fields.description: This light-roasted blend ensures a rich coffee and enveloping nutty, biscuit and caramel nuances.

fields.name: Supremo
fields.subtitle: Perfect for full-bodied brews
fields.description: A medium-roast blend that produces a soft, creamy coffee with delightful hints of almond, caramel and plain chocolate aromas.

fields.name: Classico
fields.subtitle: The perfect cafetiere
fields.description: Classico coffee blend is full bodied with a balance flavour. A blend with an intense aroma and an important body, it has a slightly fruity and spicy taste. A persistent coffee with an elastic and compact cream.

fields.subtitle: Light and floral
fields.description: A harmonious and balanced coffee in taste and aroma. A fine blend with a light roast that envelops the hints of chocolate and caramel to its full body.

fields.subtitle: Organic coffee
fields.description: 100% Rainforest certified Arabica blend: precious and sustainable. A light roasted coffee that is soft on the palate and with an aromatic profile characterized by floral and dried fruit scents and a high acidity.

fields.name: Intenso
fields.subtitle: Bold espresso
fields.description: The dark roasting of this blend gives a full-bodied coffee with a rich, lingering crema and delicious overtones of cocoa, spices and nuts.

fields.name: Cremoso
fields.subtitle: Smooth and balanced
fields.description: A light-roasted blend for a creamy, full-bodied coffee showing hints of malt, nuts and chocolate.

fields.name: Professional
fields.subtitle: Taste of world coffee
fields.description: This light-roasted blend ensures a rich coffee and enveloping nutty, biscuit and caramel nuances.

fields.name: Supremo
fields.subtitle: Perfect for full-bodied brews
fields.description: A medium-roast blend that produces a soft, creamy coffee with delightful hints of almond, caramel and plain chocolate aromas.

fields.name: Cafetiere 2 cup
fields.subtitle: Stylish Two Cup Cafetiere
fields.description: Stylish 2 cup cafetiere with stainless steel mesh filter, ideal for brewing French press coffee at home.

fields.name: Cafetiere 4 cup
fields.subtitle: Contemporary Four Cup Cafetiere
fields.description: Guard against your coffee going cold with this double walled cafetiere. The insulated design allows you to enjoy home brewed coffee for longer, whilst the art deco design makes this cafetiere a welcome addition on any table.

fields.name: Cafetiere 6 cup
fields.subtitle: Modern 6 Cup Cafetiere
fields.description: This larger six cup cafetiere is perfectly designed for a table of diners to share. The simple lines and attractive glass and stainless steel construction are perfect for busy, modern businesses which want to provide quality coffee.

fields.name: Cafetiere 8 cup
fields.subtitle: Robust Eight Cup Cafetiere
fields.description: This stylish cafetiere allows you to serve up a freshly pressed brew every time at home or in work. Making 8 cups of coffee, the cafetiere holds 1Ltr of liquids to allow your customers to share a delicious cup with friends and family. The smooth pump motion allows you to create silky smooth coffee every time that is enjoyable and refreshing, while the large side handle makes the cafetiere safe to hold and reduces the risk of spillages and burns. The smart black design is a stylish and classic look for the cafetiere that will easily match with any equipment and decor.

fields.name: Moka Express
fields.subtitle: Original Bialetta Moka Pot
fields.description:
The Moka. Unique and original since 1933.
The brainchild of Alfonso Bialetti, in almost one hundred years of history, the Bialetti Moka has won a place in the hearts and kitchens of all Italians and not only.
An excellent example of Art D�co, the Moka Express has become an icon and a symbol of �Made in Italy�, present in the permanent collection at the Milan Triennale and the MoMA in New York.
Over the years, Bialetti has perfected its characteristic design, maintaining the functional and use characteristics of the Moka: the octagonal aluminium boiler, the exclusive inspectable and easy-to-clean valve, the filter and the collector that holds the essence of the coffee extraction, black, full-bodied and hot.

fields.name: Brikka
fields.subtitle: Unmistakable pleasure of real espresso coffee to your home
fields.description:
Brikka is a unique coffee maker that allows you to prepare a coffee exactly like one from a coffee bar: creamy, intense and full-bodied.
To ensure maximum creaminess, fill the boiler up to the mark indicated inside and then continue as you have always been used to. In just a few minutes, Bialetti Brikka, with its unique, patented system will prepare a creamy sugar-ready coffee: add in a teaspoon and you will see it settle on the crema and then slowly slide to the bottom, ready to add a sweet touch to your break.

fields.name: Tricolour Mokina
fields.subtitle: A celebration of Italian coffee making
fields.description:
he Mokina is the baby in the Bialetti family, conceived, designed and built to offer you all the taste of Bialetti coffee and all the strength of a ristretto. A miniature Moka Express that allows you to prepare your usual coffee, just with more of a kick. Allow yourself a small yet immense pleasure whenever you want: the half-cup Bialetti Mokina is perfect for a quick break to enjoy until the last drop or when you need a concentrate of energy.
Moka Bialetti Tricolore was created to celebrate an all-Italian icon and, thanks to the colours of the Italian flag, it is a tribute to our world-famous way of preparing coffee.

fields.name: Rainbow
fields.subtitle: Bringing Bialetta joy to your kitchen
fields.description: Rainbow is the coffee maker from Bialetti that brings joy to the kitchen, available in the colours of the rainbow to help you wake up in a good mood. The baby in the Bialetti house will bring the scent of freshly-brewed coffee to your kitchen and a touch of joy with all its bright colours.

fields.name: Mini Express
fields.subtitle: Brews directly for two!
fields.description:
Mini Express is the original coffee maker that not only makes good Bialetti coffee but serves it directly in two cups that heat up, thanks to the special aluminium support plate, with the gentle heat of the Moka.
In the new Jungle version, with colours reminiscent of the wildest nature, Mini Express Bialetti becomes a collectible design object, inspired by nature.
Bialetti Mini Express, with its original design, is an invitation to enjoy a cosy moment with the person you love.

fields.name: Espresso
fields.subtitle: Segafredo 80ml Espresso 1 Set Cup & Saucer
fields.description: Segafredo espresso cups are durable, strong, practical and stylish. Each cup holds 80ml, the perfect shot of espresso. Thickened base to keep your coffee at an even temperature. A set of cups makes a great gift for any coffee connoisseur or treat yourself and enjoy your espresso the classic Italian way.

fields.name: Cappuccino
fields.subtitle: Mokarabia 190ml Cappuccino 1 Set Cup & Saucer
fields.description: Mokarabia Cappuccino cup and saucer sets are made of high quality, durable porcelain; strong, practical and stylish. Each cup holds 190ml, the perfect size for your cappuccino. Suitable for any type of coffee. The thick hard glaze keeps your coffee at an even temperature. These sets are equally suited for a coffee shop or in the home of any coffee connoisseur. Quantity: 1 Cup Saucer Set 190ml

fields.name: Latte
fields.subtitle: Lavazza 270ml Caffe Latte 1 Set Cup & Saucer
fields.description: Lavazza Caffe Latte cups are made of durable porcelain; strong, practical and stylish with the iconic Lavazza logo. Each cup holds 270ml, the perfect size for your caffe latte. The thick hard glaze keeps your coffee at an even temperature. Quantity 1 Cup Saucer Set 270ml

fields.name: Americano
fields.subtitle: Segafredo 190ml Americano 1 Set Cup & Saucer
fields.description: Segafredo cup and saucer set is made from durable ceramic: strong, practical and stylish. Each cup holds 190ml, the perfect size for your americano. Thickened base to keep your coffee at an even temperature.

fields.name: Classic Mug
fields.subtitle: Understated and classic mug for tea or coffee
fields.description: Give your crockery collection a fresh upgrade! Designed with an understated yet modern style, these mugs are able to add an inviting touch to any service that offers hot beverages - fitting-in with any decor. Super-vitrified glaze improves resistance to scratches, chips and staining

fields.name: Mahlk�nig X54 Chrome
fields.subtitle: Proven premium grinding profile featuring a great taste experience
fields.description: The X54 enables optimal grinding that meets even the highest demands. As a true allrounder, the grinder is suitable for many preparation methods: for your aromatic espresso in the morning just as for your pour-over or French press in the afternoon.

fields.name: Gaggia Classic Lobster Red
fields.subtitle: This household machine fully combines Gaggia's long professional tradition with timeless design
fields.description:
The iconic manual par excellence, which celebrated its 30th anniversary last year and is certainly a must-have for all coffee lovers, presents itself in 2022 in an unprecedented lobster red, vitaminic and energetic guise. An unmissable novelty, on the market since June, combining history, innovation, quality and summer vibes! The attractive colour is a clear homage to that of the famous Baby Gaggia, a cult appliance of the 70s and 80s.
Classic Lobster Red has a painted galvanised steel body and bold lines; this household machine fully combines Gaggia's long professional tradition with timeless design. Distinctive features include the chrome-plated brass group and filter holder, the 3-way solenoid valve for constant pressure control inside the filter holder, the three filters for brewing a perfect espresso according to your level of expertise, and the two-hole steam wand for perfect milk emulsion.

fields.name: Saeco Royal OTC
fields.subtitle: A timeless icon. This is Royal. And now it�s back with cutting-edge technology and high-level design.
fields.description:
A bold design. A stylish image. Professional and functional components.
Capacitive interface with photo-realistic icons.
Removable brewing unit.
Steel conical blades.
Leading-edge electronics pre-engineered for Bluetooth connectivity.

fields.name: AeroPress Coffee Maker
fields.subtitle: Lightweight and portable, making it perfect for camping and holidays.
fields.description: Other coffee makers drip hot water on to a bed of ground coffee which results in over extracting at the centre and under extracting the flavour from the edges. But the AeroPress brewing system results in uniform extraction for the ultimate in full coffee flavour. The AeroPress comes with full instructions for use; just add your coffee and water!

fields.name: Barista Professional Apron
fields.subtitle: Our apron in your kitchen!
fields.description: Our medium length apron has three spacious pockets in the front so it holds everything whether you're cooking, painting or gardening. It's made from a 35/65 cotton-poly twill blend and it's machine washable.

fields.name: Male T-Shirt
fields.subtitle: Classic, generous, boxy fit
fields.description: Male model shown is 6'0" / 183 cm tall and wearing size Medium. Heavyweight 5.3 oz / 180 gsm fabric, solid colours are 100% preshrunk cotton, heather grey is 90% cotton/10% polyester, denim heather is 50% cotton/ 50% polyester. Double-needle hems and neck band for durability.

fields.name: Female T-Shirt
fields.subtitle: The standard, traditional t-shirt for everyday wear
fields.description: Female model shown is 5'8" / 173 cm tall and wearing size Small. Heavyweight 5.3 oz / 180 gsm fabric, solid colours are 100% preshrunk cotton, heather grey is 90% cotton/10% polyester, denim heather is 50% cotton/ 50% polyester. Double-needle hems and neck band for durability.
